repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.physloc: Materials are stored off-site, and will require additional retrieval time. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.
did.abstract: This collections consists of material amassed by International Brotherhood of Teamsters teamster Arden "Art" D'Amico, dating from 163-2007.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into 5 series: Contract and Agreements, General and Miscellaneous, IBT General President Elections, IBT Local 639, United Parcel Service.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:
Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository.

Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of material amassed by International Brotherhood of Teamsters teamster Arden "Art" D'Amico, dating from 1963-2007. The records include contracts and agreements with various companies, primarily the United Parcel Service

Labor unions -- United States -- History -- 20th century

controlaccess.corpname: International Brotherhood of Teamsters, Chauffeurs, Warehousemen, and Helpers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains contracts and agreements for AFL-CIO and Teamsters unions dating from 1967-2003. The majority are National Master Freight and National Master United Parcel Service agreements and their supplements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains general and miscellaneous materials related to the Teamsters union dating from 1986-2003. Included are IBT convention materials, constitutions, and rosters, as well as news clippings, newsletters, pamphlets and miscellaneous materials.

did.unittitle: IBT 26th Convention Official Delegate and Committee Member Lists
IBT Blue Ribbon Commission on Teamster Finances
Rules for the IBT International Union Delegate and Officer Election
A Steward's Guide to Enforcing the National Agreement

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains IBT General President Election materials dating from 1996-2001. Included are campaign materials from both James P. Hoffa and Ron Carey, election results, and photographs. Also of note are materials detailing former IBT General President Ron Carey's election disqualification by Federal election monitors in 1997.

did.unittitle: Hoffa Unity Slate IBT Convention News

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains materials produced by and about IBT Local 639 of Washington, DC, dating from 1982-1991. Included are correspondence, executive board minutes, newsletters, and local union election campaign materials from both The New Generation of Teamsters and the Concerned Members' slates.

did.unittitle: Local 693 vs. United Parcel Service Legal Proceedings
The New Generation of Teamsters Slate
Rules for the 2000-2001 IBT International Union Delegate and Officer Elections
Local 639 Flag with various pins attached
Local 639 Pouch with various pins inside

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains material related to the United Parcel Service dating from 1982-2001. Most of the series details the 1997 UPS Teamsters strike through various correspondence, meeting notes, newsletters, magazines, news clippings, and contract campaign materials. The rest of the series is comprised of various other materials, including grievance and disciplinary forms, health/welfare/pension information, training information, and contracts and agreements.

did.unittitle: "UPS Teamsters for a Strong Contract" Newsletter
